name: DiastolicBloodPressureLessThan90
title: Diastolic Blood Pressure Less Than 90
description: Name change from "Diastolic BP <90 Most Recent, G8754".  Add CPT Level II codes.  Add inactive HCPCS codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Most recent diastolic blood pressure < 90),(Data Element Scope: Representative diastolic blood pressure < 90),(Inclusion Criteria: HCPCS codes that represent only a diastolic blood pressure < 90),(Exclusion Criteria: Systolic blood pressure codes, codes that represent both a systolic and diastolic reading)
